scenario.name: UAC with media
scenario.send: INVITE sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: target <sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 101 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: target <sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 101 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: target <sip:456@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 102 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp [authentication username=usera] Content-Length: [len] v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
